    public getBrowserLanguage(supportedLanguages: *): * source

    public getChannelComponents(): Object source 

    import {getChannelComponents} from 'Apps/External/Helpers/CommunicationChannelRegistration'

    Get the dynamic component registration hash for communication channel components.

    Return:

    Object

    Registration hash of found components where the key is the component name.

    public getComponents(index: Array, basePath: String, componentPath: String, components: Object): Object source 

    import {getComponents} from 'Apps/External/Helpers/DocumentSearchTypeRegistration'

    Generate the dynamic component registration hash based on the computed index.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    index Array

    Directory index of components, can be a subset.
    basePath String

    Base path for components you want to register (empty by default).
    componentPath String

    Current component path (used during recursion, empty by default).
    components Object

    Current component registration hash (used during recursion, empty by default).

    Return:

    Object

    Registration hash of found components where the key is the component name.

    public getComponents(index: Array, basePath: String, componentPath: String, components: Object): Object source 

    import {getComponents} from 'Apps/External/Helpers/CommunicationChannelRegistration'

    Generate the dynamic component registration hash based on the computed index.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    index Array

    Directory index of components, can be a subset.
    basePath String

    Base path for components you want to register (empty by default).
    componentPath String

    Current component path (used during recursion, empty by default).
    components Object

    Current component registration hash (used during recursion, empty by default).

    Return:

    Object

    Registration hash of found components where the key is the component name.

    Get the dynamic form validator hash for all form field validators.

    Return:

    Hash of found form field validators where the key is the form validator name.

    public getQueryString(query: Object): String source 

    import getQueryString from 'Helpers/QueryString'

    Process supplied query params and return a query string.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    query Object

    Object containing query parameters as key/value pairs. Supported value types are:

    • array (will append duplicate parameter names with separate values)
    • object (will be converted to JSON)
    • boolean (will be converted to 0/1)
    • string
    • number

    Return:

    String

    Complete query string with URI encoded values and prepended with a question mark (?).

    public getScriptAttribute(attribute: String): * source 

    import getScriptAttribute from 'Apps/ChatIntegration/Helpers/ScriptAttributes'

    Get attribute value of the host SCRIPT tag.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    attribute String

    Attribute name.

    Return:

    *

    public getValidators(index: Array, basePath: String, validatorPath: String, validators: Object): Object source 

    import {getValidators} from 'Helpers/FormValidators'

    Generate the dynamic form validator hash based on the computed index.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    index Array

    Directory index of form validators, can be a subset.
    basePath String

    Base path for validator you want to load (empty by default).
    validatorPath String

    Current validator path (used during recursion, empty by default).
    validators Object

    Current validator hash (used during recursion, empty by default).

    Return:

    Object

    Hash of found validators where the key is the validator name.

    public injectElement(tagName: String, attributes: Object, targetTag: String): Boolean source 

    import {injectElement} from 'Apps/ChatIntegration/Helpers/ElementInjector'

    Injects an element to the DOM.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    tagName String

    Element tag name.
    attributes Object

    Element attributes with names as keys and corresponding values.
    targetTag String

    Target tag name to append the element to.

    Return:

    Boolean

    public lighten(color: String, percent: Number): String source 

    import {lighten} from 'Helpers/StyleFunctions'

    Returns lighter color from the provieded color (by provided percentage). Implementation mimics behavior of the lighten() in SCSS language, so it can be used to substitute it.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    color String

    RGB color as a hexadecimal string
    percent Number

    Percentage to lighten

    Return:

    String

    RGB color

    public linearGradient(color: String): Object source 

    import {linearGradient} from 'Helpers/StyleFunctions'

    Returns linear gradient style for provided base color.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    color String

    RGB color

    Return:

    Object

    VueJS object suitable for the style binding

    import {linearGradientOverlay} from 'Helpers/StyleFunctions'

    Returns linear gradient overlay style for provided base color and image path.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    color String

    RGB color
    imagePath String

    image path

    Return:

    Object

    VueJS object suitable for the style binding
